name: Cookie Typer - C++ Re-Write
description:
ABSOLUTLY THE WORLD'S BEST C++ CONSOLE GAME This game was made in an hour for a challenge. Prepare to loose brain cells when you'll see how terrible this game is.

Hello ! This is Sirius B back with another cookie clicker game but instead you use your keyboard !

This is the remake of a old game called Cookie Typer which I failed to make under an hour. This version of the game is functionnal but it's absolutly terrible.

Licensing
